greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows. T(1,1)=-1, n>1: If n/k=A020639(n) then 1 else 0.
comment: Let A=T(n,k)*T(n,k), B=A*A, C=B*B, D=C*C, and so on. Then the first column in the last matrix (D) converges to the Liouville function.
results.author: _Mats Granvik_, Oct 03 2010
